interestsLabel1: DIY and creativity, hot yoga and travel. I like building things with my hands, staying active and exploring new places.
name: Susana Venda
heroOneLiner: I design and lead technical delivery for enterprise: architecture, DevOps and teams that ship.
aboutMe: Senior IT Architect with 10+ years in architecture, DevOps, automation and enterprise delivery. I bring structure to complex environments: migration strategies, governance and cross-team alignment. I'm strengthening this with certifications in solution architecture (AWS SAA in progress) and data science (University of Cambridge Career Accelerator, in progress).
workValues: I care about clarity over complexity, ownership end-to-end and leaving systems better than I found them. I prefer to unblock teams with concrete decisions and reusable patterns rather than long meetings.
